definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
lit. mustn't speak of two things on the same day (idiom); not to be mentioned in the same breath/incomparable
pinyin: bu4 ke3 tong2 ri4 er2 yu3

definition: lit. to speak of two things on the same day (idiom); to mention things on equal terms (often with negatives: you can't mention X at the same time as Y)
lit. mustn't speak of two things on the same day (idiom); not to be mentioned in the same breath/incomparable
pinyin: wei4 ke3 tong2 ri4 er2 yu3

sentences.english: On the same day Wen also met with former Malaysian Prime Minister Dr. Mahathir bin Mohamad.
sentences.chinese: 同日，温家宝还会见了马来西亚前总理马哈蒂尔。

sentences.english: Today, as your country well knows is a differnt day altogether.
sentences.chinese: 你们国家非常清楚今天可完全是不可同日而语了。

sentences.english: On the same day, Yang held talks with his Gabonese counterpart Paul Toungui.
sentences.chinese: 同日，杨洁篪与加蓬外长通吉举行会谈。

sentences.english: On the same day, the International Media Seminar on Peace in the Middle East opened in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 同日，中东和平问题国际媒体研讨会在北京开幕。

sentences.english: On the same day, Wen met leader of Greece's New Democracy party Antonis Samaras.
sentences.chinese: 同日，温家宝还会见了希腊新民主党主席萨马拉斯。

sentences.english: On the same day, Ukraine's Parliament Speaker Volodymyr Lytvyn met with Yang Jiechi in the parliament building.
sentences.chinese: 同日，乌克兰议长利特温在议会大厦会见杨洁篪。

sentences.english: Yeah. But Bob's talent can't to be named on the same day with Carl's.
sentences.chinese: 不错，但是鲍伯的才智可无法与卡尔同日而语。

sentences.english: Beijing Multi-campus Bike Ride Supports the International Day Against Homophobia.
sentences.chinese: 北京高校学生自行车环游支持“国际不再恐同日”。

sentences.english: However, the regular script then couldn't match that of Jin and Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 然而宋代楷书，却不能与晋唐楷书同日而语了。

sentences.english: But the unlucky beast's defences were no match for the raging hippos.
sentences.chinese: 但是这不幸的野兽的防卫岂能和河马的暴怒同日而语。

sentences.english: Expelled from the party the same day the party was also Second Vice card Charlie.
sentences.chinese: 同日被开除党籍的还有该党第二副主席卡查利。

sentences.english: Intra-day settlement Trading settlement within less than one day.
sentences.chinese: 同日结算在一日之内交易结算完毕。

sentences.english: Because the quality is not the same.
sentences.chinese: 因为质量不可同日而语。

sentences.english: On the same day, Dai also held talks with Equatorial Guinea's Deputy Prime Minister Demetrio Elo Ngong Nsefumu.
sentences.chinese: 同日，戴秉国同赤几第二副总理恩东举行了会谈。

sentences.english: On the same day, Li also held talks with Lithuanian Foreign Minister Antanas Valionis.
sentences.chinese: 同日，李肇星还与立陶宛外长瓦廖尼斯举行了会谈。

sentences.english: Do not slaughter a cow or a sheep and its young on the same day.
sentences.chinese: 无论是母牛是母羊，不可同日宰母和子。

definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
late last year/the end of last year
the other day/a few days ago
to plan to/to draft (a plan)/to imitate/to assess/to compare/pseudo-
doubtful/suspicious/variant of 擬|拟[ni3]/to emulate/to imitate
Nikkei, abbr. for Nikkei Shimbun 日本經濟新聞|日本经济新闻[Ri4 ben3 Jing1 ji4 Xin1 wen2]/abbr. for Nikkei 225 index 日經指數|日经指数[Ri4 jing1 zhi3 shu4]
